Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its high-quality features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $95. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a value that exceeds your expectations while also allowing me to fairly compensate for the investment made in creating this product. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
